name: Spray Ball - Train Your Brain
description:
+ 42 levels + 18 new (Level: Difficult)
+ No Ads

The game where you will train the mind while having fun!
Mental ability

Are you able to get all stars? You must copy the model ball by covering parts of your ball and painting with 6 spray colors.

- 60 levels, with increased difficulty in each level.
- 3 stars per level, try to surpass the levels with the minimum of movements ...
- 180 stars in total.
- 4 tools + 6 colors to complete each level. Many combinations!
- Solutions included in each level.
- Use the casings and belts to cover part of the ball and paint the visible part.
- The best puzzle / strategy game to train the brain and the mind!
- Game fit for all. Ideal for family play. Complicated.

Game of mental ability, to exercise the mind.
You have to think in reverse to get past the levels, so it is a good game to train and exercise the mind.
